export const BookList = ({title, books}) => { const image = "http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api"; return (

{title}

    {books && books.map((book) => (
  1. {book?.title}
    {title?.subtitle}
    2. ))}
); };
